QueryResult.text: SELECT ID BASELINE_DETAIL_KEY, OBJECT_ID OBJECT_KEY, OBJECT_TYPE, NVL(USAGE_SUM,0) USAGE_SUM, NVL(COST_SUM,0) COST_SUM, NVL(START_DATE,TO_DATE('01/01/1900','MM/DD/YYYY')) START_DATE, NVL(FINISH_DATE,TO_DATE('01/01/1900','MM/DD/YYYY')) FINISH_DATE, NVL(DURATION,0) DURATION, LAST_UPDATED_DATE FROM PRJ_BASELINE_DETAILS WHERE IS_CURRENT = 1
